title: Storage Options Quiz
description: Choose the right storage solution for different scenarios.

questions.question: You need to store user preferences like theme and language. Which solution is most appropriate?
questions.explanation: SharedPreferences is ideal for simple key-value settings like theme and language preferences. It's lightweight and purpose-built for this use case.

questions.question: Your app needs complex SQL queries with joins across multiple tables. Which solution should you use?
questions.explanation: Drift is the best choice for complex relational queries. It provides compile-time SQL verification and supports joins, transactions, and migrations.
